dogs.name: Chicken Feast Dry Dog Food
dogs.description: A premium blend of chicken and grains for a healthy and happy dog.
dogs.details: Contains high-quality chicken protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and essential vitamins for a shiny coat and strong immune system.

dogs.name: Beef Lover's Wet Dog Food
dogs.description: Savory beef chunks in gravy, perfect for picky eaters.
dogs.details: Rich in protein and essential minerals, this wet food supports muscle growth and overall health.

cats.name: Salmon Delight Cat Food
cats.description: A gourmet mix of salmon and sweet potatoes for a nutritious meal.
cats.details: Includes omega-3 fatty acids and taurine for heart health and a glossy coat.

cats.name: Turkey Feast Grain-Free Cat Food
cats.description: Delicious turkey formula for cats with sensitive stomachs.
cats.details: Grain-free, packed with vitamins and antioxidants for optimal digestion and energy.

dogs.name: Reflective Dog Collar
dogs.description: A durable and reflective collar for safer walks at night.
dogs.details: Adjustable size, made with nylon and reflective stitching for visibility.

dogs.name: Chewable Dog Toy
dogs.description: A fun and durable chew toy to keep your dog entertained.
dogs.details: Made from non-toxic rubber, ideal for teething puppies and active chewers.

cats.name: Cat Scratching Post
cats.description: A sturdy scratching post to satisfy your cat's instincts.
cats.details: Made with sisal and soft fabric, keeps your furniture safe from scratches.

cats.name: Cozy Cat Bed
cats.description: A plush and cozy bed for your cat to relax in comfort.
cats.details: Machine washable, made with soft faux fur for maximum comfort.
